timeline.bodyText: I think this one can benefit from checking the questions loaded as well. However unlikely it might be, we don't want a situation whereby the session details are loaded but the questions are not to pass here.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
wkurniawan07
wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: This logic (skip checking if contribution question) should be in the page objects instead? That way no question needs to be skipped.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: Let's just hard-code the statistics here. Similarly for the numscale question statistics.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: I don't think the variable isExpected is necessary?
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: \n -> System.lineSeparator(). Similarly in other parts of this file.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: All the other throw new RuntimeException should be changed to Assert.fail as well
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

replies.bodyText: Hmm... For some of them if I change to using fail, I have to add a return null after to avoid missing return statement error. Is it better if I change to throw new AssertionError() instead?
replies.author: jtankw3
